Today's not my day... More bad news: Alloran, your char profiles have
been accidently cleared as well. My comp is giving me really weird
feedback, so I thought they were still there. They arn't :-(



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Hehehe. You guessed my plan! I was gonna draw everyone's attention
> away from all the top secret stuff that's going on in the RPG by
> making them fill in their char profiles! No, just kidding. It was a
> pure accident.
> 
> 
> AAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Ok,
more
> bad news. The message board has just been accidently cleared. I
really
> thiink I should knock myself out or something before I accidently
> destroy something here! I'm very sorry about this too, guys.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> > Grrrrrrrrrrrr, Yan I will kill you :P
> > 
> > Seriously though, dont get so worked up, if people are smart and
> nice,
> > they will realise you didnt do it on purpose. Your not doing some
> kind
> > of conspiracy are ya Yan :P
> > 
> > And if everyone is smart, they should have back ups :)
> > So if anybody gets upset at Yan, you will have to deal with me :(
